column2: There is a proposition to create an elite special branch in our military for foreign recruits. This force will be better trained and equipped than our regular armies.
We should create an institution to display the archaeological achievements of our nation.
We could search for the remnants of the ancient Cental American civilization
It seems We must use force to search for those ancient ruins.
There are rumors about an ancient city lying beneath the ground. If the rumor is true, It would be an amazing discovery. We should start searching.
